com.irurueta.server.commons.email

Class ApacheMailSender

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.irurueta.server.commons.email.EmailSender<org.apache.commons.mail.Email>
      • com.irurueta.server.commons.email.ApacheMailSender

  • public class ApacheMailSender
extends EmailSender<org.apache.commons.mail.Email>
    Class to send emails using Apache mail.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ApacheMailSender

        private ApacheMailSender()
        Constructor. Loads mail configuration, and if it fails for some reason, mail sending becomes disabled.

      • isValidConfiguration

        private boolean isValidConfiguration(String mailHost,
                           int mailPort,
                           String mailFromAddress)
        Indicates if provided configuration is valid by checking that SMTP server and mail from address are not null, and server port is valid.
        Parameters:
        mailHost - SMTP server host.
        mailPort - SMTP server port.
        mailFromAddress - email address to send emails from.
        Returns:
        true if configuration is valid, false otherwise.

      • internalSendApacheEmail

        private void internalSendApacheEmail(EmailMessage m,
                           org.apache.commons.mail.Email email)
                              throws NotSupportedException,
                                     org.apache.commons.mail.EmailException,
                                     EmailException
        Internal method to send email using Apache Mail.
        Parameters:
        m - email message.
        email - apache email message.
        Throws:
        NotSupportedException - if feature is not supported.
        EmailException - if Apache Mail cannot send email.
        EmailException - if sending email fails.
